ai.summary: A short, easy woodland loop along the Loughbrickland/Whyte Estate Woodland Trail in the UK. At 1.9 km, it's a gentle walk through shaded forest with a flat to gently undulating path, suitable for families and casual walkers.
ai.terrain_summary: Surface is a well-maintained woodland path with compact earth and gravel. Expect some roots and damp sections after rain; ground can be uneven in places. Trees provide shade and a tranquil, scenic setting.
ai.safety_notes: - Wear sturdy footwear with good grip and be cautious on damp, slippery surfaces. - Stay on the marked path; watch for roots and uneven ground. - Be mindful of other trail users, including cyclists and dogs. - Check weather conditions before you go; rain can make surfaces muddier. - Keep your distance from wildlife and supervise children; consider carrying a lightweight first aid kit.
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer, and Autumn; year-round in milder winters, though the ground can be muddy and weather can be harsher.

seo.title: Loughbrickland / Whyte Estate Woodland Trail – 1.9 km Easy Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore the easy 1.9 km Loughbrickland/Whyte Estate Woodland Trail in the UK. A family-friendly woodland walk with shaded paths, gentle terrain, and peaceful scenery.
seo.h1: Loughbrickland / Whyte Estate Woodland Trail – 1.9 km (Easy Hike) in the UK
